_sText:
Map inspired by the game "Minecraft". Created with the source graphics engine for Counter-Strike Source.

=======objective=======

Trying to get to the center, to enter the portal, which will take you to choose the multiple games, which are:

Scout and Knife: typical scout and knife map. Kill the other team with Scout and Knife.

AWP: AWP typical map. Kill the other team with AWP.

Ice Skate: typical ice skate map. Kill the other team with Knife.

Race: typical race map. Run as fast as you can and overcoming all obstacles, to reach first and get the m249.

Bhop: typical bhop map. Jump as fast as possible, reach the end and get the m249.

Knife Battle: kill the other team with a single blow with the knife.

Random Weapons: Each round will be different, try to point you in the head.

Climb: Climb typical map. Upload as fast as you can without falling, and you will get the m249.

Train: Buy a gun, you have 10 seconds to do, and 3 seconds to hop on the train, which will go to full speed. Try to kill the other team, before they do so.

HE: HE typical map. If in 5 min not win, it will break the barrier.

Survive: Try to survive the fall of TNT, these will fall randomly, try to last longer than your opponent.

Zombie Attack: Try to survive the hordes coming at you from all sides, headshots, to kill and shooting in the arm to not get hurt. Care at the end, with the Enderman.

Break Glass: breaking vidro of where your opponent well, make him fall.

Diamon Search: search the entire mine diamonds in chests and in its raw form, when you get the 3 diamonds earn.

Strongholds: finds the portal to the end. in order to win.

Total: 15 minigames + 1 random for the undecided.

If there are errors, comment :).

Enjoy FuChuSS
